New Records: The goal scored by Youri Tielemans was the third quickest in the history of the European Championship.
Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored the opening goal for Belgium after just 75 seconds.
Kevin De Bruyne sealed the win for Belgium with a goal 10 minutes from time.
Others: The result means that all four teams in Group E now have three points, with the remaining fixtures to be played on Wednesday.
